column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////They do give you a chance to preorder your pizza while waiting which makes it faster once seated. As we were waiting
column2: we ordered some buffalo wings and I swear they were spectacular. Once seated
column3: our waitress recommended their signature pizza which was tomato
column4: sausage and cheese. Although we would have loved for it to be hotter
column5: the taste was everything we were hoping for.
